Uses of Class
xxl.core.cursors.joins.SortMergeJoin

Packages that use SortMergeJoin
xxl.core.cursors.joins The package xxl.core.cursors.joins provides miscellaneous implementations of the join operator on cursors. 
xxl.core.relational.cursors The package provides a whole algebra of cursors that extends the functionality of the classes cursors. 
xxl.core.spatial.cursors Provides mappers for different type of Point and Rectangle objects as well as several join algorithms: nested loops distance similarity-join for Points, the spatial join algorithm based on space-filling curves proposed by Jack Orenstein, similarity-join algorithm "GESS: Generic External Space Sweep" and hash-based plane sweep for two-dimensional data. 
 

Uses of SortMergeJoin in xxl.core.cursors.joins
 

Subclasses of SortMergeJoin in xxl.core.cursors.joins
 class SortMergeEquivalenceJoin<I,E>
          A sort-merge implementation of the equivalence-join operator (especially the equi-join).
 

Uses of SortMergeJoin in xxl.core.relational.cursors
 

Subclasses of SortMergeJoin in xxl.core.relational.cursors
 class SortMergeJoin
          This class realizes a join operator based on the sort-merge paradigm.
 

Uses of SortMergeJoin in xxl.core.spatial.cursors
 

Subclasses of SortMergeJoin in xxl.core.spatial.cursors
 class GESS
          This class provides the similarity-join algorithm "GESS: Generic External Space Sweep" (see "[DS 01] GESS: a Scalable Algorithm for Mining Large Datasets in High Dimensional Spaces by Jens-Peter Dittrich and Bernhard Seeger, ACM SIGKDD 2001." for a detailed description of this method).
 class MSJ
          This class provides the MSJ (Multidimensional Spatial Join) similarity-join algorithm proposed by Koudas and Sevick in "[KS 98] Nick Koudas, Kenneth C.
 class Orenstein
          The spatial join algorithm based on space-filling curves proposed by Jack Orenstein.
 class PlaneSweep
          Plane Sweep for two-dimensional data.
